rows.label: qev091704_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, this is Lan'cord's data.
That's one objective down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0002
rows.name: Now we just need to find the good doctor himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0012
rows.name:
Welp, we've got Lan'cord's research data.
Now we just need the good doctor himself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0013
rows.name:
Hmm, let's try the consoles in other holds as well.
One may turn up a clue to his whereabouts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0003
rows.name: Finally! It's Lan'cord's data! Took long enough...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0004
rows.name: We should have made that roach talk and saved some time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0005
rows.name: Plus it would have been fun.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0006
rows.name: Okay. Next time, torture first, THEN shooting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_SEL0011
rows.name:
Say that the Murderess's plan
sounds much more efficient.

rows.label: qev091704_SEL0021
rows.name:
Remind the Murderess that
BLADE does not permit torture.

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0007
rows.name:
See? You get it.
Who has time for mercy when there's cash on the line?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0008
rows.name: Speaking of, let's get back to the city. That reward's waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0009_2
rows.name: You and Irina really ARE the fun police.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0010
rows.name:
Look, when we get back,
I'll be happy to show you how useful torture can be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev091704_MSG0011
rows.name: But first, let's get that reward.[ST:wait ]
